name: VANILLA MILK Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands..Key Notes: Bourbon Vanilla Bean Extract, Upcycled Cocoa Shell, Frangipani..Fragrance Description: Delicious yet sophisticated, faceted yet smooth, Vanilla Milk is a fragrance of paradoxes. This Eau de Parfum uses two types of vanilla extracts, a touch of florals, delectable cocoa shell, rich amyris, and a creamy milk accord. VANILLA MILK is specially created to wear the best on skin. The scent is designed to get better with your own body heat and chemistry...About the Bottle: The creamy tone is meant to evoke vanilla's delectable yet comforting qualities...About the Fragrance: Ellis Brooklynu2019s Bee Shapiro and female Irish perfumer Meabh McCurtin, two outsiders to the perfume world, came together to create a vanilla fragrance from a fresh perspectiveu2014one that is uniquely addictive...
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Hydroxycitronellal...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray on pulse points or on the body as desired. After spraying, wait 8-10 seconds for the scent to warm with your skin and adapt to your body chemistry. ...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense....Recycling Instructions: .-The glass bottle and outer cardboard box are 100 percent recyclable.

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz / 50 mL eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: With love, anyone who gives this more than one star either received free product for an incentivized review or is lying to themselves. Thereu2019s a reason only 27/438 reviews are verified purchases and maybe 1/4th are non-incentivized. This is one of the most off-putting fragrances Iu2019ve ever had the displeasure of smelling. Itu2019s the first perfume Iu2019ve encountered thatu2019s genuinely made me retch when sampled. I can only describe it as smelling like a post-vomit bathroom where someone tried to mask the smell by spraying an air freshener: sour, pungent milk and cheap vanilla. For most perfumes, even if I donu2019t personally like them, I can at least understand why someone else might enjoy them. I cannot with this one. I canu2019t imagine how this got past a marketing team, testers, and corporate review. As a vanilla lover, I donu2019t even know who this is for. Do not blind

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I discovered how nice this smelled by accident. I left the store, raised my hand to put my sunglasses on and smelled one of the nicest scents ever - I loved it!  I ended up going back to the store the very same day to test the perfume on my arm to see if it was this particular perfume that I was smelling and it was!  Ended up splurging on a full size bottle.  I am a vanilla perfume lover and I haven't found one that I truly loved since The Body Shop stopped making its Vanilla Perfume Oil.  This one's going to be my go to fragrance from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wish people were a little more patient with this one. I thought I absolutely hated it, but now it's my signature scent. it gives vanilla, but for the effortless cool girl. she's wearing Aritzia, chucks, and rocks a bob, with a ton sick tattoos. most perfumes smell like alcohol when you first spray it, but because of the heavy milk note in this one, those two scents merge, and it smells slightly sour FOR THE FIRST COUPLE SECONDS. but as it sits and the alcohol dissipates, it becomes a smooth, creamy, almost iced sweetened condensed milk dream scent without it being too heavy or cloying. allowing it to macerate also helps get rid of that sour milk smell eventually. give it a chance!   (it also layers sooo well with everything! it rounds out any sharp smelling perfumes and brings out any vanilla notes that might get lost in musks)

I would say it leans towards a musky milk and vanilla scent on me but on my roommate this smells more woody and vanilla.

That being said I suppose Iu2019m not surprised by the amount of reviewers here that dislike it; the scent is more u201cmilku201d than u201cvanillau201d and the sandalwood is surprising. I would trade every vanilla perfume in my collection for vanilla milk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The initial spray smells exactly like vanilla extract.  Within a few minutes, a sharp, musky note overtakes the sweetness of the vanilla.  Over time, the fragrance dries down to a combination of spices and smokiness.  Vanilla is still present, but itu2019s very faint and in the background.  I never detected any of the floral notes nor did I get an overpowering milky essence, but rather a slight creaminess that peaks through primarily at the opening and dry down.  This is a warm, cozy scent that makes you feel like youu2019re sipping a hot chocolate topped with cinnamon and nutmeg next to a bonfire.  If youu2019re seeking a fragrance that leans more woodsy vanilla than super sweet dessert vanilla, youu2019ll enjoy this.

reviews.review_title: Not a blind buy for some.. but a fav for me ud83dude0d

reviews.review_text: Hear me out. On first spray.. smells a little sour milk-ish.. BUT once it warms up on my skin I get this beautiful vanilla bean and sandalwood scent!!! Itu2019s so warm and comforting! I know depending on your bodies chemistry some will love and some will hate but for me itu2019s a win. Iu2019ll be honest and say itu2019s definitely NOT A BLIND BUY however!! I love layering this with Sol De Janeiros new Delu00edcia Drench body butter!!! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love vanilla scents and this one is a must have. Each individual has different body chemistry and I am happy that this works for me. It smells like vanilla bean on my skin, but of course it will smell different for each person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited for this perfume because I love a vanilla, milky, creamy scent but I was very disappointed when I smelled the perfume. I first sprayed it on a piece of paper and I could smell the vanilla but it was a bit too musky. Then, I sprayed it on my wrist and waited for it to dry. When I smelled it, I was taken aback. I could no longer smell the vanilla, it just smelled like spoiled milk. The scent was very powerful and unbearable. Since perfumes smell differently on every person, it may smell great for some but on me it smelled like rotten milk.

reviews.review_title: Soy milk and bug infested stale wood

If you give it 5-10 minutes, the milky part of the scent definitely simmers down and is more tolerable. The warm part of the scent definitely last all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin

The vanilla notes are balanced beautifully with a hint of almond and musk, creating a sophisticated and alluring aroma. It's perfect for both daytime and evening wear.  The packaging is also very chic and stylish, making it a great addition to my vanity. ud83dudc95

I hated this fragrance so much I had to shower to get the smell off of me. I would not recommend and this isnu2019t a great first impression for a first time Ellis Brooklyn user.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, Iu2019m not saying itu2019s badu2026 in a strange way I kind of like it. Definitely gets better over time. But think of a vanilla protein shake, it smells just like that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Not your typical vanilla, not a blind buy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m not a big vanilla scent person, as I find most vanillas smell too strongly like baked goods. Hesitantly I tested this in store on myself and fell in love. Itu2019s perfect. My new favorite perfume. Itu2019s a rich scent but also a bit more elegant than most vanilla perfumes Iu2019ve tried. I wish they would make it in a larger size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ellis Brooklyn's VANILLA MILK Eau de Parfum is more than just a delightful fragrance; it's a guilt-free indulgence. The commitment to sustainability shines through with clean and planet-positive features, from the thoughtfully crafted vegan and cruelty-free formula to the absence of parabens and phthalates.  The sustainable packaging reflects a dedication to minimizing environmental impact. The warm and spicy fragrance, categorized as a sweet gourmand, is a beautiful paradoxu2014delicious yet sophisticated. The blend of bourbon vanilla bean extract, upcycled cocoa shell, and frangipani creates a unique olfactory experience.  What sets VANILLA MILK apart is its careful curation by Bee Shapiro and perfumer Meabh McCurtin, outsiders to the perfume world, bringing a fresh perspective. The fragrance evolves on the skin, responding to body heat and chemistry, making it a personalized and enchanting choice. Embrace the paradoxes and enjoy the guilt-free luxury of VANILLA MILK.

reviews.review_title: Buy it if you love SWEET SCENTS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great staying power. I can still smell the perfume on my clothes and itu2019s been a week. Just took one star off because itu2019s not for me. Itu2019s toooo SWEEET and I feel like the milk scent is overpowering

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is a vanilla lovers dream come true! It has a smokiness that reminds me of creme bru00fblee.  What I love most about this scent is that what you smell on the first spray, is exactly the same scent you smell all day. The scent lasts a really long time too. This is really such a gorgeous scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is so cozy. Itu2019s perfect for the cold seasons. It smells like vanilla, but a very soft and comforting version. It turns into a sweet goodness in my skin. I find it suitable for both daytime and evenings. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As most people know, perfume is a highly subjective experience. On me this smells so soft and sweet, close to vanilla ice cream without the heavy caramel artificial sweetness and with a warm woodsy base. I get compliments every time I eear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells absolutely delicious and almost exactly like the scent of vanilla extract. The travel size is perfect for on the go and traveling aspects. I would definitely recommend trying to perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, I totally get why this is such a polarizing scent. There are a lot of really hard to pin down notes that I think could read really differently for different people, and I also feel like this is one of those scents that's really influenced by individual body chemistry.  That said, I am IN LOVE with this fragrance. To me it smells like the cold whipped cream on top of a caramel frappe, and it's such a nostalgic and comforting scent. It warms up quite a bit throughout the day and loses a bit of its lactonic scent, but it's still a great vanilla gourmand scent with lovely depth.   I'm a vanilla perfume girly for sure, and I have a huge collection. But this fragrance is by far one of my faves, I would totally recommend trying it if you like a very creamy, complex vanilla u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_title: Not good for a blind buy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When I first sprayed it on my skin it was a really nice vanilla-cream scent, but once it dried down it smelled like vanilla but had a super smoky/burnt smell, which gave me a migraine. definitely depends on if you like a smoky smell or not, would recommend trying it on first before buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extreeeeeemely sweet vanilla scent. Not for me, way too strong

reviews.review_text: I've been wearing vanilla anything since 1993. I love vanilla. I mean, LOVE vanilla. But this? This here is like baby throw up. Sour formula puke on your shirt. Easily the worst thing I've ever smelled that claims to be vanilla. I got a sample of it just so I could smell for myself and the reviews are right! Grossest thing EVER.

reviews.review_title: Unique vanilla, but proceed with caution
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I really like this perfume. The opening notes create this creamy, almost custardy vanilla scent that isn't necessarily sweet but smells comforting. What keeps me from rating this a 5/5 is the dry-down, which is more smoky and not something I particularly enjoy in the long term. I am impressed by its longevity, especially on clothes. Three spritzes are enough to last me through the day.  As others have said this is not a safe blind-buy. I recommend getting a sample or testing it in-store before committing to the purchase. If you happen to be into it then it's a great vanilla scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is a true sensory masterpiece! I am absolutely captivated by its ineffably beautiful scent. It's a warm and sweet gourmand fragrance that I find irresistible.  This fragrance is pure magic, and I can't recommend it enough to those who appreciate a truly delightful olfactory experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: longest lasting perfume i have ever used!!

reviews.review_title: Need A Bigger Bottle, Perfect For Fall & Winter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the dry down of this perfume i bought the smallest one and it doesnu2019t have a spray top on it but you dan it on which i love!! I think it smells very gourmand like vanilla extract with a little smokiness to it

I got the travel size of this to test it out since this was my first time getting anything from this fragrance house. I tested it in store and thought it was unique among all the florals. Upon first spray, this smells like vanilla milk as the name implies. After a few minutes, itu2019s nearly off putting and like spoiled milk like other reviewers have mentioned, but after a little while, it turns into a very nice milky vanilla scent like cereal in milk sans the spoiled part. This is very much a skin scent and for that, I wouldnu2019t bother spraying this on my clothes. Itu2019s also kind of potent, though I do have a sensitive nose, so I push the sprayer down just a little to get a few droplets on my skin on a few body parts and thatu2019s enough. I donu2019t think this is a fragrance you can bathe in, especially since it lasts for hours, at least six, so youu2019d have to commit to the milk if you spray too much. I have two perfume oils that smell like two types of cereal and mixing them makes me smell like a bowl of fruity pebbles and Frosted Flakes which can be fun sometimes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Iu2019m literally just leaving the store after I randomly sprayed it on myself. I am in love. I came straight here to post a review LOL. For all my people who donu2019t like that child-like, dessert type vanilla smell, this scent is for YOU!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn in exchange for my honest review. Now since weu2019re being honest, Im not crazy about this product. I love a vanilla perfume, but this has a sour scent to it instead of a sweet or warm scent, especially after it dries.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Oily skin

It has the vanilla that is perfect but mixed with some richer darker florals giving it a lot more depth than a vanilla musk. Definitely let it sit on your skin and warm up as is recommend it really helps to bring out all the notes of this warm scrumptious fragrance. Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn

reviews.review_text: smells very rubbery/moldy and dries down even worse; i love a lot of her other fragrances but this one is awful. do not blind buy this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The initial spray smelled like expired milk to me. I smelled it in store on the paper so I didnu2019t have a lot of time for the dry down so my review mostly on what I first smelled. To me itu2019s overpriced for what it smells like and Iu2019d avoid blind buying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the VANILLA MILK Eau de Parfum complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn and absolutely love it. As always with the Ellis Brooklyn perfumes, it will give you a very personal experience by interacting with your body heat and chemistry. It is like participating in a chemical reaction where your body is one of ingredients. You will smell variety of scents until you get the final individual one. For me, it smells like a vanilla extract first, then changes to a vanilla bourbon, and then turns to the mix of sandalwood and spices at the very end. The final scent lasts for hours and feels very cozy and warm. I like it. I think to make your mind about this perfume, you need to test it on your body.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn. Very sweet warm opening. When I put it on I was delighted with it, however after a while, it seemed that I had nothing on. I been putting it on at different hours of the day in hopes to get an accurate feeling/ smell wise of it's fragrance and lasting time. So far I'm disappointed. Perhaps it's this particular bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing. I was a little worried when I first sprayed it. It smelled too vanilla, too sweet. However, once it dried down it smells more like a cocoa, darker, rich scent. The perfume lasted over 5 hours on me.      This product was gifted by Ellis Brooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the Vanilla notes in this scent, I cant really make out the Frangipani in it, and I grew up around those, it kinda smells like a cookie cake. Its sweet but not super over power, the scent is great for outside events and summer.  *Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: Ellis Brooklyn gifted me. When I first sprayed this fragrance, it smelled like sour milk, but on the dry down it became a sweet, smoky & warm vanilla. For this scent, you have to be patient and wait on the dry down. It puts me in the mind of Maison Margiela's by the Fireplace.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn's . This fragrance is an absolute delight! The blend of vanilla notes creates a warm and comforting aura that lasts all day. Not only does it smell divine, but it also evokes a sense of sophistication and elegance. The packaging is sleek and chic, adding to the overall luxurious experience. I highly recommend Ellis Brooklyn's Vanilla Perfume to anyone who appreciates a beautifully crafted fragrance that leaves a lasting impression.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells decent in the bottle but when I put it on my skin it smelled AWFUL. It nearly made me sick it smelled like spoiled milk and mold idek. Maybe it dries down differently on different ppl.

reviews.review_title: For you if you want to smell like a vanilla cookie
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn. If your dream is to smell like a vanilla sugar cookie, this is the fragrance for you! On me the sweetness lasts about two hours before the scent fades into a subtle warmth that lasts for another good six hours. I was excited about the frangipani, but the sweet vanilla scent is pretty overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: (gifted by Sephora) I honestly canu2019t tell if I like this perfume or not. Sometimes I do, sometimes I donu2019t sometimes it has that nice sweet scent and then other times it has this really musky sour scent to me. Definitely not a favorite of mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received complimentary from Ellis of Brooklyn. This fragrance is a warm, delicious very sophisticated scent. The perfect summer scent that is not cloying and it wears well for hours. The packaging is aesthetically pleasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like wearing perfume every day to fulfill my day and mood with fragrance of elegance and happiness. I like sweet and warm smells and was very intrigued to try the Vanila Milk Perfume by Ellis Brooklyn. I apply it behind my ears and on my neck every morning and it lasts for hours, my husband calls this fragrance u2013 super sexy. This perfume has a very sophisticated and sweet smell with light notes of peony rose, musk and has a bit of vanilla cocoa smell. I like a travel size bottle since I can carry it in my purse and reapply when I need it. Itu2019s my new favorite perfume and I would definitely recommend it to my friends. This sample was gifted by Ellis Brooklyn in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wanting to try this foreverrr & so happy I was able to. I love how it's light and not overbearing. It's a creamy vanilla with a really subtle spicyness to it. I usually wear it in the morning and touch up in the evening with a new spritz. Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn in exchange for my honest review. I really like this fragrance. The name is definitely true to the scent. It smells like a creamy/milky/vanilla. It does smell amazing but I donu2019t think itu2019s a super unique scent. Definitely something pleasant enough to wear daily though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance was gifted by Ellis Brooklyn in exchange for an honest review. I really enjoyed this scent especially for a night out. Itu2019s the perfect mix of vanilla and floral. Got many compliments while wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn . This is a unique perfume, I know people either love or hate it. To me, it smells like how a creamy brown sugar milk tea tastes. However, others say it smells like a rotten vanilla cream. Itu2019s a light but unique scent, and wonu2019t be for everyone. It fades fast too in my opinion, I often canu2019t smell it on myself after an hour and others donu2019t comment either. However, I really enjoy it because I have never smelt anything like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The initial scent is a rich, creamy vanilla, like a vanilla bean fresh from the vine. As it dries, a milky smoothness emerges, adding a comforting depth to the vanilla. The subtle touch of musk adds the perfect finish. There is also this spiciness that makes it extra interesting which I personally really like. I love that it's light enough for daytime wear, but would also carry well into the evening. Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It smells lovely, like vanilla ice cream with a sugar cone. It is strong and long lasting so I wouldnt recommend using too much. It also starts off sweet, not needing a strong alcohol base to go away which is nice. Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free for my honest review. Vanilla bases have a tendency to be heavy but this Vanilla Milk by Ellis Brooklyn is a perfect example of how to use a vanilla perfectly. This sweet and warm gourmand is intoxicating to the senses. At first spray it is a strong vanilla aroma, but as your body chemistry changes it develops into a pleasant fragrance of sweet vanilla, touch of floral, with a creamy milk finish. It really blends well together to give you a immensely feminine and sophisticated scent. Itu2019s long lasting and makes you think of curling up in a cozy chair, with a good book.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn in exchange for my honest opinion. Personally, I didnu2019t love this scent. Itu2019s smells nice at first u2014 very vanilla and sweet but then as it dries down, it has a bit of a sourness to it. It doesnu2019t work for me, so Iu2019m going to pass along to a friend who likes it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like this perfume. It is a little strong for me but itu2019s a really nice smell. It also stays on for a while and does not ware off!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: these reviews SHOCKED me when I opened them. I bought this without any previous knowledge of the scent at a makeup store- I just happened to pick it up and literally walked back to it three times before purchasing it. It smells amazing on me! Definitely has to be due to body chemistry that the reviews are so terrible. Works so well on me, I adore it. Test before you buy on your skin before purchasing just in case though!

reviews.review_title: For the love of god, test before you buy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought a sample set from Ellis Brooklyn because I was looking to treat myself. I ended up liking sun fruit and bee enough to commit to full size bottles, but also decided to blind buy the vanilla milk scent too. I figured it would be impossible to mess up a vanilla gourmand, but I was very wrong. At first I kind of liked it, but the more I wore it, the more I noticed a burnt plastic note that gave me a headache and started to make me feel nauseous. Itu2019s the first scent Iu2019ve ever returned

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like chai tea with milk or like eggnog with spiced rum.  Itu2019s very very odd.  I ended up spraying kayali yum pistachio over it and it worked well layered.

reviews.review_title: Polarizing Scent - Must Test on Your Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If it works with your skin chemistry, it's magical, especially the dry down. When I first sprayed this, I thought I made a mistake. It smelled plasticky, like an amped up version of those old vanilla baby-doll heads. I think it's the florals (frangipani and jasmine?) mixed with the milk in the top notes. It's just sort of weird and off-putting. However, after fifteen minutes, it becomes a wonderful vanilla milk scent that lasts for hours. I've never smelled another vanilla like it. I have a very basic nose. I hate strong, complex perfumes, but this one is pretty amazing if you can get past the first fifteen minutes. I purchased the travel size, but I kind of regret not getting the bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the most sickly smelling foul things Iu2019ve ever come across in my 43 years on earth. So glad this I only have a mini of this. Why are they making this? Who do we petition to stop them? A hard no!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate it. Glad it was a sample and not full size. I'm not even sure how ro describe the smell.

reviews.review_title: I want to roll in this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't stop smelling myself, this is so wonderful! It's a warm, smoky and sexy vanilla. I definitely smell the milkiness and it's so so so pleasant. I want to bathe in this, I'm OBSESSED!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this but Iu2019m glad I sampled it before purchasing. Definitely need to see how it reacts with your skin chemistry before buying it because for me it was so offensive I needed to wash it off. I got a strong hit of spoiled creamer with a hint of urine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this yesterday in-store at Sephora and add me to the list of people that don't understand that reviews. It smells so good. You really get the milky vanilla and then this smokiness but it's not a burnt rubber or charred or anything like that. I don't know how to really describe it as I haven't had a scent like this before but it smells good. It really gives me a soft sensual vibe. It's actually the first unisex fragrances I've ever smelled and loved. And the cherry on top is that the scent has staying power because you can love a fragrance as much as you want but it's a total dud if 10 minutes later, it's as if you never sprayed it on in the first place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019ve ever had a blonde vanilla oat latteu2026 this is that scent in a bottle. I got it through a sampler kit and iu2019m definitely repurchasing this one when itu2019s out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m confused by everyones reviews of this??? I am wearing it now and it smells super sweet and light. I love that I can smell it all day! I guess body chemistry plays into it but it smells fantastic on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t get the spoiled milk thing (I know body chemistry is different for everyone) on me this is pure vanillic heaven. My husband says it smells like vanilla milkshake I get more of a lactonic vanilla but in a creamy way like the lightest sandalwood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this one in a sampler kit, but it was by far my least favorite. I tried it on multiple occasions to try to make it work, but it just smells weirdly sour to me. There's almost a spoiled milk scent to it on my skin. In the bottle it smells more like sugary cereal milk, so I'm not sure if it's just having a bad reaction with my body chemistry or what. Either way, not really an appealing scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The title of this scent was so promising. I was let down when I smelled this. It smells like a burning dumpster full of tires. It smells like someone burnt popcorn and tires and then tried to cover up the smell by lighting a very cheap, faint vanilla candle.

reviews.review_title: Smoky, but not in a good way.

reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this as I love most Ellis perfumes, but this smells like pork rinds, only sweeter.  You smell like youu2019ve been at a BBQ.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m giving it 2 stars because I didnu2019t figure out it was a gourmand until it arrived. I love a sugary sweet scent, BUT this truly smells like dairy. Like pure milk on the skin. Itu2019s super potent. It made my stomach turn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe itu2019s a bad batch but it smells like ROTTEN OLD MILK!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smelled good for only 1 second until it turned into burnt rubber on my skin. Smells like burnt rubber and spoiled milk combined and itu2019s nauseating. I had to scrub it off my skin. ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: SMELLS TERRIBLE!!! It seriously smells like rotten vanilla milk, itu2019s disgusting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i've tested this two different days. Vanilla Milk is a more subtle, warm fragrance. it is milky for awhile but that fades into that warm? cold? slightly strange smell when you open the doors to the ice cream shop. ice cream and toasted waffle cones mixed together. The first day I did get that spoiled milk scent. It was very brief. The second day the opening was outer cocoa shell husk that dissolved into the inner shell of the husk. More cocoa than dirty, hairy husk. It went milky and now has the ice cream in toasted waffle cones. This has the sweetness and warmth factor of the waffle cone, not the ice cream. The vanilla extract for baking smell is there. It is not sweet in that factor. Vanilla Milk is semi-sweet. Will I buy it? I don't know. It is long lasting and more of a personal scent. If you don't like milk or are expecting super sweet vanilla candies you will be disappointed. It's definitely not your average perfume.
Smells like a nice day at the beach, very vanilla strong. im in love with this perfume. I get really bad migraines when it comes to certain smells but this is very light and nice.

reviews.review_title: Great staying poweru2026 maybe try before you buy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t understand all the dislike of this scent!  It has a cold vanilla smell almost like the air hits your face walking into an ice cream parlor.  I could see maybe that this wouldnu2019t work with everybodyu2019s body chemistry, but I consider myself lucky that it works with mine!  It has great staying power.  I apply it onto my brachial arteries (inner elbows) and the delicious scent stays with me all day.

reviews.review_text: I got a sample with my purchase and I couldn't stand the smell, I had to throw it away in the trash can outside. It smells like vanilla with a strong hint of sour milk.

It reminds me of a urinal I got a sample and the first thing I smelled was that ! Itu2019s so disgusting. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely disgusting.   This smells like sour milk.  Fortunately, this was a sample that I received with my purchase.  It will be going in the trash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Creamy, vanilla, and also a bit of woodsy background. Loved it, do not understand the negative reviews. Perfumes are very personal, but I greatly enjoy this, it feels warm, cozy, and a bit seductive even.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent of this perfume is felt like the smell of a rotten egg or rotten milk or something similar to this. I'm a big vanilla perfume fan, but this perfume makes me vomit. highly do not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like rotten milku2026.I just donu2019t understand how it smells so bad! That one star thoughu2026.thatu2019s for the u201cstaying poweru201d of this perfume. No matter how much I tried to get it offu2026.I still smelled it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so scared to try this because of the reviews but I got a mini as a gift and itu2019s still absolutely stunning. On me there is nothing sour except maybe a weird smell right at the top but it vanished before I could make it. My husband spent the whole night telling me it was like sleeping with gourmet vanilla gelato. Scent was still there in the morning in the best possible way.

reviews.review_text: This turned out to be one of my favorite fragrance purchases recently and I use it daily. I work in an office, so it's important that it's not overwhelming but it still smells milky with a good amount of vanilla. I get compliments on it constantly

reviews.review_text: If I could give this zero stars, i would. This legit smells like rotten vanilla milk. I couldnu2019t even scrub off the smell of spoiled milk off my wrists. I donu2019t understand how anyone would release this product. Itu2019s disgusting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
