reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: super disappointing. the milk note smells curdled and savoury in a not good way :(( really really wanted to like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually love vanilla anything, but thisu2026 ughu2026 this just is not a good vanilla. Iu2019m glad I only got the travel spray. I just wish I had gotten the Amber insteadu2026 it is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: okay so this should be called Vanilla MILK! It's definitely milk-forward and I can understand why it doesn't work on everyone's chemistry. But for a gourmand vanilla that isn't sickly sweet? This is my fave. It layers so well with fruity + sweet perfumes to soften their edges, and brings this cold vanilla ice cream flavor to things. If you don't like milk frags, you won't like this. If you're expecting it to be dripping-sweet like Kayali Vanilla, you won't like this. If you want a safe blind buy, this ain't it. haha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Based on the notes, I really thought I would love this.  I'm so glad I didn't blind buy it!  When I smelled it in store, it was so sour I had to recoil.  To me, it smells like someone vomited vanilla ice cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so much, but the initial scent right after I sprayed it was so alcohol-y and that reminds me of cheap fragrances. If I spend this much money, I want to smell opulent. Once it dries the alcohol scent goes away, but then it's very sweet; too sweet for my taste. I don't know, it's not horrible, but it just wasn't for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is beautiful amber vanilla that I love on my skin. Vanilla Milk is comforting, warm, and cozy. It has a slight booziness to it that makes it more mature, but still youthful. Itu2019s a soft and creamy vanilla milkshake with a twist. Lovely and not too sweet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely a divine scent.  I feel that the this perfume is so rich and full of fragrance. I totally can smell the vanilla mixed with citrus and sweet notes.  Fall type of scent.  like that I do not need to keep reapplying the scent because it is indeed long lasting. The traveling package is just perfect. I do like the style and design. It looks pretty and very modern.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing. Last , on me, only about two hours. Recommend for short term outing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this scent! I have always been a sucker for anything vanilla scent and this is no exception. i love the vanilla mixed with the undertones. Will be wearing this everywhere!!! Iu2019ve also gotten tons of compliments on it which is a great boost

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice product. I like the formula, the packaging, and the way it sprays. Personally Iu2019m not a huge fan of the scent but thatu2019s just me. Itu2019s very musky and kind of reminds me of my grandma lol. I was expecting more of a cleaner, sweeter vanilla scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love vanilla scent but on me I felt this smelt similar to cat urine. Iu2019m happy I received this only as a sample, disappointing because u201cVanilla Milku201d sounded heavenly.

reviews.review_title: Burning incense and now a new favorite
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this without testing it and before reading the most helpful reviews. I wish I saw more reviews that included what the reviewer normally wears, so I usually wear Sean Jean Unforgivable Woman, Prada Candy, Gucci Bloom, Glossier You and Nest Citrine. Vanilla bases are usually too heavy on the sweet/sugar for me, but the reviews I read made it sound like something I'd wear- a cozy, relaxed scent- and it kinda is?   To test it (and for my review), I sprayed on my wrist then dabbed my wrists together: when wet, it smelled like vanilla extract but more unnatural. I gave it a few minutes to dry down: it smelt like a generic soy candle that had just been blown out and quickly morphed into burning incense (the vanilla scent was under the candle blowout but not the incense.) Then, 20 minutes after application: it's like someone blew out the incense, then opened a few windows on a Saturday morning before starting a deep clean day; it's so nostalgic and cozy and warm! The vanilla is there, but it's like getting under warm, clean sheets after taking a bath or walking into a boho boutique. It's also not very strong: I have to put my nose up to my wrist to smell it.  It's been about an hour and it smells the same as the 20 min. dry down. I cannot smell any milk/milky scents, and I never got burning rubber or spoiled milk. Maybe I got lucky or maybe this perfume decides when it works for people? It reminds me of my Sean Jean perfume, so it's definitely going to be a part of my rotation. I don't think I would wear this to the office, maybe on a date; it's very casual, doesn't smell like it belongs to any specific season and I think I'll use it on my off days just for myself to enjoy!

reviews.review_title: Would definitely add this to my collection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Vanilla scented perfume is my ABSOLUTE favorite so I was not hesitant to get this one when I saw it. And to my surprise I love how itu2019s vanilla scented but with a hint of wooden spice.. if that makes sense. It smells like sexy grown up vanilla haha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really dislike this perfume. It smells okay in the initial spray - like a salted vanilla that's warm and not too sweet at all. But almost immediately after the dry down, it becomes something so strange and chemical.. almost like a gas or burning chemicals. I don't think the name 'vanilla milk' suits the fragrance at all, and I would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve gotten so many compliments on this scent! It has become one of everyday perfumes. I am a gourmand, sweet scent lover and this perfume is sweet and a bit fresh. Iu2019m a student and try not to wear scents to school that are too overpowering because that can be a bit much when you have to sit next to some for a few hours. Itu2019s the perfect strength and lasts all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume. It smells so sweet and fresh at the same time. I can definitely use this as an every day scent. Itu2019s different than my usual scent but I have gotten so many compliments on it. Iu2019m looking forward to buying the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this scent! I love the smell of vanilla and this is a vanilla that has a sophisticated touch. It lasts all day and Iu2019ve received several compliments. Itu2019s perfect for every day wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent. It isnu2019t too strong, but I wouldnu2019t spray too much at once. It has a very long lasting power so two sprays is all I really need. The vanilla scent is definitely very prominent and I love vanilla scents so itu2019s a plus for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells literally exactly like vanilla. If you like vanilla scents, youu2019re going to love this. Def a must have for vanilla lovers! I love the convenience of a travel size. Def a must have for me!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really quality packaging and beautiful feel. This bottle gives off luxury vibes. It also has the BEST mist/spray, better than any other perfume Iu2019ve tried (and I have at least 20 constantly in rotation). Itu2019s a fine mist that covers a large amount of body space so the perfume is perfectly defused and because of this you can apply less and save more. The scent itself is VERY fragrant, so a little goes a long way. The fragrance lasts for a while however it may need to be reapplied after a few hours. The scent smells like literal desert, very strong vanilla and cocoa, also kind of like brown sugar. Other people said it smells like spoiled milk and I will say the one I received thankfully did not. Maybe they got a bad batch. For me personally itu2019s a little too sweet but if you love scents that almost smell edible you will love this one. Itu2019s definitely more of a night scent for a date night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way this perfume smells, you donu2019t need a lot to and it smells for hours. It is sweet but not overpowering. I really like this small container because can put it in my bag or just slide into my jeans pockets and go.

reviews.review_title: Smells Pretty but not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the Ellis Brooklyn Vanilla Milk, it gave me a memory of a creamy aroma so soft yet sweet scent. I love it , itu2019s pretty mid , not light . I usually just spray once on myself and pretty good throughout the whole day . I didnu2019t really want to overdo it, once spray is good enough. Smells really pretty love it tho

reviews.review_title: For those who love vanilla scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Based on the description I expected the fragrance to be a bit more delicate with some sweet tones. The scent vanilla scent is very prominent and long-lasting. I can definitely say that this fragrance will not be for everyone. I think people who like the scent of vanilla will really like this. I do appreciate that the brand is vegan and cruelty free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Never had a warm vanilla scent before so it was a nice surprise! Super cute packaging. Perfect for a cozy winter. Its pretty strong when you initially apply it but after some time it settles on your skin pretty nicely, it last all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent of this and also love how small it is for travel. I'm a huge perfume collector and this is the first time I've been able to try the brand. I love the name of the brand too! The perfume itself itsnt too overpowering and us very delicate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s the perfect travel size perfume. If you love vanilla you would love this scent. It smells super fresh and unique. It last for a very long time. I like that the Ellis Brooklyn products are Vegan, Sustainable Packaging, Clean + Planet Positive, Without Phthalates, Without Parabens , Cruelty-Free. I would definitely recommend this perfume if youu2019re looking for a super fresh scent .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love small perfume sprays because they serve so many purposes - travel size, perfect for your car or purse, and to test a fragrance before committing to a full size. I usually LOVE vanilla scented anything. Most of my candles at home are vanilla! And a handful of my favorite perfumes. But I just couldnu2019t get myself to love this. Itu2019s a heavy scent and while vanilla isnu2019t necessarily u201crefreshingu201d, notes of it can be. This is muskier and more like an overwhelming layer that doesnu2019t really make you feel clean. To each their own!

reviews.review_title: 10 minutes on skin and it settles to amazing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First and foremost, yes, it smells bad if you go on the first whiff of it when you only first put it on your skin.... give it 10 minutes folks, and it's super enduring and classy and unique.  I have 30 expensive good quality perfumes at home, put this one on and within a week of wearing it, I got 2 compliments, when before that, I had no compliments from my other scents.  I would say this scent, like all scents, will depend on your skin.
I wanted to love this scent, but it literally smells like rotten milk in the bottle and on my skin. Super disappointed, but I'm glad I still have the Sweet scent from Ellis Brooklyn and love that

I agree that it smells like pure vanilla extract BUT it oddly works on the skin (my skin at least). In fact, I got the Ellis discovery set and I know everyone loves Salt and itu2019s okay, but vanilla milk was my favorite on my  skin.
It smells exactly like vanilla extract to me.. Iu2019m not sure why everyone is going crazy In these reviews but I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's wild how many people don't like this...I have become fully obsessed. This is like...Vanilla extract vanilla. Definitely opens slightly bitter, but within 10 mins transforms into such a comforting vanilla, not too sweet, but to me feels like a pure vanilla smell without the 'frosting' sweetness. On me, it's a soft, soothing, creamy vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t understand the bad reviews. I love this scent. Itu2019s sweet without being cloying. A warm vanilla scentu2014like vanilla extract in a warm baked good? For reference I like Vanilla Woods perfume but donu2019t like any of the commodity milk scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t even touch this anymore. Tried to give it a fair shot but it is truly just unwearable. It smells chemically and smoky - but not in a good way. At all. There are so many better options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the worst perfume I've ever smelled. I tested it on my sweater in store and the scent was so nauseating. I could still smell it in my car for days after. It's very synthetic and sour smelling.  I guess the only plus is it's long lasting. I normally love perfumes with lactonic notes, frangipani, vanilla, and jasmine. I didn't get any of those notes from this. Such a shame because this brand has a lot of really good scents- I have Sweet and Sunfruit, and they are lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: VERY disappointed in this fragrance. I saw all the hype about it and it drew me in. It almost has a burnt vanilla smell. Not attractive nor feminine. It's just not good. I wish I would've passed on this one. I like their other scents but this one was very disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes
reviews.review_text: this sweet smelling fragrance makes me feel lovely! one spritz is all it takes for an all-day, fresh scent. that being said, my bottle has been lasting me quite some time. this creamy vanilla is now one of my favorite scents and it just nails every note iu2019ve been wanting!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this but it just wasnu2019t for me.  The scent is not appealing to me at all.  It almost has a sour milk vibe to it.  It definitely smells better on me than just smelling it in the bottle.  I will say though that this fragrance has serious staying power and was much better layered with another fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So this is not a usual scent. It isnu2019t entire vanilla ish. Itu2019s a bad version of vanilla maybe. Iu2019m not sure Iu2019d want to wear it at any time or for any occasion. Smells like a very very cheap perfume in short. Maybe some people would like it but I didnu2019t like it hours later either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first spray it smells like the pina colada car freshener at a self service car wash, but the dry down settles into a nice vanilla. I think there are better vanilla scents out there.

reviews.review_title: Smells like burnt and fake vanilla
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Vanilla gourmand scents are typically my favorite during the fall and winter, but this one is not one that I really like. I smell too much of the musk notes, and it doesnu2019t smell good on my skin. It smells burnt to me which I really canu2019t stand. The vanilla is very fake smelling to me too. I was pretty disappointed by this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is so amazing! This is my kind of scent. The smell of vanilla is so sweet and not too strong which I love. It stays for a very long time and I highly recommend this to everyone. Itu2019s a must buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely heavy on the vanilla side of things. Almost like you splashed vanilla extract on yourself. The lasting power of this is strong as it stays all day. If youu2019re into sweet vanillas scents you may enjoy this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Trying different perfumes is one of my favorite things! I have yet to find my u201csignature scentu201d but Iu2019ve had a great time looking. This new one is long lasting, a little strong for my preference and warm. I think if you like deeper vanilla scents, this one is for you. Search continues for my holy grail

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a mini size perfume from Ellis Brooklyn in exchange for an review. The vanilla smell of the perfume is a bit too strong and too sweet, smells like vanilla extract. Not what I am expecting and personally donu2019t like itu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve always been a huge fan of Ellis Brooklyn fragrances and this may be my favorite! Iu2019ve also tried their Bee and Amber ones.   This Vanilla Milk is superb! 1-2 sprays is all you need for a wonderful scent. Lasts about 5-6 hours for me and then starts to dissipate. The notes are perfectly twisted together for the ultimate fragrance! I love the Creamy Milk Accord, Frangipani, Bourbon Vanilla Bean, Madagascar Vanilla Bean, Sandalwood, and Musk! Itu2019s truly an intoxicating scent!   If you like vanilla scents that are overbearing with a soft gourmand scent, this is one youu2019ll truly enjoy! I will definitely buy the full size! I will say if you want a comparison to the Commodity Milk and this, Iu2019d pick this. I have both and the Commodity Milk is EXTREMELY strong and more masculine. I think this one is more feminine and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little too strong for me but a beautiful scent. The scent notes are beautiful and they set to a subtle scent. Luckily it matched my bidy chemistry really well. I love the sleek bottle and packaging style very much. First time trying out this brand and loving it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first experience with Ellis Brooklyn fragrances, and I have to say this one is fabulous. There is that warm vanilla/ambery/musky scent coupled with a very clean scent. This is perfect for everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i think this is my new favorite!!!! it smells SUPER sweet when you first put it on but as soon as sets it kinda warms up and you can truly smell the vanilla! i definitely have to buy a full size of this, i know some people say the smells donu2019t last long from this brand but iu2019ve been wearing it for 24 hours and i can still smell it (and i currently have a cold)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: have loved fragrances and having different types of sense in my collection for a very long time. This one is really nice because I feel like the vanilla scent isnu2019t too overwhelming and I love how it comes in a travel size to take it with me easier on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a nice sweet traveling perfume and this one smells amazing. I love this scent and jt lasts pretty long than I thought it would. I definitely would be using this and having it part of my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Ellis Brooklyn Vanilla Milk fragrance.  I love vanilla scented fragrances, but many are overpowering and can even come off synthetic smelling.  Vanilla Milk has such a light, beautiful, natural vanilla fragrance.  I was also impressed with the staying power of the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Finally a vanilla that doesnu2019t make me smell like a candle. I think vanilla is a scent that is really hard to get right, but this is not a sugary sweet vanilla, itu2019s more complex and has undertones reminiscent of smoky sandalwood. My husband really likes when I wear it too! It lasts on my skin for hours and a little goes a long way, but I still wish I had a bigger bottle because itu2019s so wearable and the scent puts me in a good mood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I can say it smells good but no itu2019s a big no for me. I love vanilla fragrances but this doesnu2019t smell like it at all. Infact it has a really weird smell. I canu2019t explain but something like paper mixes with milk and that too rotten kind of. I wonu2019t be wearing this. Some people may like it but definitely not me.
I got this product in exchange for my honest review. In my opinion this perfume has a very sweet vanilla smell and I think it would be perfe for those people who like sweet scents. I liked it a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One thing is I try every perfume with vanilla. This one has a very strong vanilla scent and the milk will start really coming out. This definitely isnu2019t for everyone. I will say you have to test it. It really isnu2019t bad but you need to see if it mixes with your body chemistry. It still need to see how I feel completely about it. Plus I love vanilla scents

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOOOOF oh man I did NOT like this upon initial spray. It smelled like vanilla yogurt that had been left on a counter to me (which I think is to say: something off about the milk note?)  But Ellis Brooklyn says this is designed to improve upon skin, and I must say it did. Itu2019s actually been quite an experience to wear this. The milk notes disappeared, and later a smokey scent emerged. It kind of smelled like u2026a vanilla cigar, perhaps? (I donu2019t smoke sou2026itu2019s a guess). I felt mentally transported to an old tavern (thereu2019s something old-fashioned in feeling with this scent), and I kept continually smelling my wrists in awe of how much this scent had morphed.  Final remarks: I really think this is one to test before buying. Itu2019s a whirlwind of scent experiences, and I think the name u201cvanilla milku201d drastically falls short of capturing the essence of this fragrance. I also highly recommend pushing through the initial scent wave as..I found it odd (it seems other reviewers did as well). But the lasting scent is truly special.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you like vanilla, musk scents this is the one for you! It is very crisp with a warm vanilla sugar scent. It is nice for an everyday scent or if you like something warm for a cold outing. Perfect stocking stuffer for the holidays

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the vanilla and rose notes for parfum the scent reminds me of a night out.  The parfum ingredients are 90% green chemistry and two types of vanilla I feel sophisticated when wearing the parfum and I get many compliments when wearing it.  My husband loves it as it now reminds hims of our special night

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can actually smell this lingering still the next day, which speaks to the great staying power!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to buy this after seeing all the bad reviews. My store finally had it in stock so I smelled it in store. I liked it, but didn't buy it at first. It haunted me, and I ended up going back and buying it. It is exactly what vanilla milk smells like. It's soft. It's smooth. And at the end of the day, the musk component is most prominent. I don't really smell the smokiness though. I really like it, you might not.It might not be good to blind buy (which I rarely do with perfume anyways). I am, however, not a fan of the packaging. Sometimes when I pull the cap off, the entire part becomes unscrewed and I almost spill perfume all over. This is why I'm taking a star off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I  had a tester of this product and thank goodness I didnu2019t blind buy. It made me gag so hard when I put it on my skin. I have at least 6 or 7 other vanilla perfumes and this smells nothing like a creamy comforting vanilla to me. It smelled like milk on me. I had to try to scrub it off because it was making me so nauseous. DO NOT BLIND BUY THIS. Apparently based off the reviews it works with many other peoples their chemistry but it was horrible on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a Amber Vanilla fragrance for women. Top notes are Milk, Peony, Frangipani and Jasmine; middle notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Madagascar Vanilla and Cacao Pod; base notes are Benzoin, Amyris, Sandalwood and Musk. I didnu2019t like this perfum when I first sprayed it, but when it dries down it smells like a nice vanilla scent with a little smoky touch. The lasting power is moderate. I would recommend testing it before buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am sooo impressed by this fragrance! It smells so divine, sweet but not overpowering in any way. I can actually smell this lingering still the next day, which speaks to the great staying power! Definitely need the full size next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought it without smelling a tester first. Scent is not for me (I usually live vanilla scents). Unfortunately it made my whole room scented until I actually took a closer look and found that the atomizer wasn't screwed on all the way. Only 20% left. Wasn't able to return. Check your bottle before you lose your product to evaporation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this scent, but then I don't like it. It fades away too quickly and kinda smells like Vanilla bean ice cream. A bit too sweet of a smell for me and I don't see myself putting it on or wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells super good! I love anything that itu2019s vanilla notes so I knew I would like this. Only thing that I wish it had a longer longevity but other than that I really like it and would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Typically I absolutely adore vanilla perfumes and tend to gravitate towards them, along with floral scents. I do have to agree with others here that this is a bit different than I was expecting. I much prefer this after itu2019s been on the skin for at least an hour, but I donu2019t think itu2019s the best vanilla fragrance on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: if you like the smell of vanilla extract, this is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Big no no for me. Smells like straight up milk on my skin, nauseating. This is not a perfume you wear to smell good. Do not buy until you try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just opened this up and tested it. It smells like straight vanilla extract with a Smokey fireplace note. This is definitely not a blind buy, and this is coming from someone who LOVES gourmands and vanilla scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: on my skin, this smells like something warm and nostalgic, like a childhood dessert, maybe? It stays close to the skin (which I prefer) and doesnu2019t smell like u2018perfumeu2019, it smells like natural cuddly post-shower/lotion skin. It has a similar vibe to EB Fawn, but less overtly sexy. It makes me feel comfy and safe and sleepy. I think the worst thing I can say about it is that the opening does smell a bit like Nesquick vanilla milk - which I like lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I was a teenager I had this habit of leaving dirty cups in my room. After a week or so theyu2019d mold and they would have this particular scent to them. This smells exactly like that. I am appalled.

reviews.review_title: Fleeting vanilla quickly shifts to smoke
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is interesting: it sprays on a vanilla gourmand, then a wood smoke note quickly emerges.  After about the first 10-15 mins. the smoke note shifts to a smoggy cigarette smoke and overtakes the vanilla.  This isnu2019t a good fit with my skin chemistry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not gonna lie, when I first bought this I absolutely hands down hated it. But it grew on me. I had bought a travel size and regretted it but I found myself coming back to it. One day I wore it on a whim and my son, who normally canu2019t stand my perfumes because I own so many, said, u201cWow, you smell so good!u201d He has never said this before. I own over 100 perfumes. Guess this one is a keeper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: At at initial spay, it smells AMAZING and gourmand!!! In the beginning, you get the smell of  artificial vanilla flavoring (not in a bad way!!! artificial vanilla flavoring is just a bit brighter and less earthy compared to natural vanilla) mixed with real milk. As if you're smelling a REAL vanilla milk cocktail/milkshake or pudding. But within the nest 3 minutes, woody and smoky notes begin taking over the milky notes and at the end you're left with a woody scented vanilla candle Because, it has that paraffin wax smell in the dry down. Very interesting! Not my cup of milk ;P but I can see people really liking this scent. It is nice! Just not something I would wear in the long run. BUT, what I LOved about this fragrance, is that it isn't the overwhelming nor overpowering-VANILLA-in-your-face scent, its soft. I associate it with a soft and fluffy teddy bear that you would got for someone you really adore or have a big crush on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent. Ellis Brooklyn Bee was my favorite until Vanilla Milk. I purchased the purse to give it a try and will be getting the 1.7 oz bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells exactly like the contents of a coffee thermos thatu2019s been lost in your car for two months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. This is a scent that takes patience to get to its heart. Initially and for the first 7 or 8 uses, I picked up a smell that made me think of burning plastic. Yes, burning plastic. It was pronounced, unpleasant, and it lingered. But I stuck it out and was eventually rewarded with a scent that more closely reflects my expectation based on the perfume's name and the product description - soft, but rich vanilla, creamy, and airy.  I have mixed feelings about this fragrance - the scent is lovely but the 2-3 hours that it stays on my skin isn't very long and makes this a pass for me. It's a pass for me, but YMMV. It's definitely one that should be sampled before purchasing a full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can't understand why this doesn't have higher ratings!!! This is an AMAZING scent. It has an initial scent of an almost peppery sweet aroma and I can see how that might turn some off however, after a few minutes, it settles into the skin and you will astound anyone you walk by the rest of your day and into your evening! I will always buy this and I hope it always sells at Sephora. I love it!!!!! It makes you smell SO good and feminine! If you love vanilla, get this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it so much!! This has quickly become the perfume I keep in my handbag to reapply during the day. It strong at first and then mellows out and leaves a beautiful fragrance all day! Perfect for the fall!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ellis Brooklyn Vanilla scent was so nice. To be honest I love vanilla and this had a nice musky undertone to it but since it broke in transit it was very very very strong all over the items it touched. Unfortunately since it broke I canu2019t wear It did last a long time though and anyone who loves vanilla would like

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't quite hate this perfume, however, it had way too much benzoin for me. It was a bit chemical-y, otherwise, it smelled like vanilla extract. Definitely try a sample or in-store before purchasing. I think it smells okay, I just don't think I could handle wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent. I received a sample with my order of Bee and immediately ordered this one. Warm and delicious. Try before you buyu2026body chemistry is different for everyone but I am so pleased with this fragrance and several in the EB line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like Haagen Dasz vanilla bean ice cream. Took off a star for longevity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, my perfume was damaged in delivery, so basing my review on scent alone. This scent is Cozy and warm . The vanilla is pure with a kick of spice . The scent seems to be a great signature for fall or winter. I was gifted by Ellis Brooklyn .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smelled like an old dusty dentist office combined with spoilt milk. Try it in store BEFORE buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It just smells like vanilla extract and.. that's about it. Like if you were just mixing it in water to make cookies. It's not unpleasant persay but I find it incredibly one-note and just very lackluster. There's no depth to the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm such a fan of Ellis Brooklyn Rrose and am just branching out into gourmands so...I was excited to try this. I will say the first note I smell is like a toasted marshmallow note... definitely smoky. But then it dries down to a nice vanilla bean note and it has the lasting power of a beast....literally lasted all day. So.... I'll keep this but definitely wouldn't purchase the larger bottle. But if you like a smoky vanilla scent you'll probably like this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay I love everything from Ellis Brooklyn but this was just a major flop for me. I tested it out in the store, on my skin, and it smelled like rotten milk to me. I had to wash it off immediately when I got home.

reviews.review_title: Creamy, cozy, and warm on my skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Smells warm and creamy on my skin, with a very light smoke touch that I personally love, as it reminds me of autumn nights and campfires. Confused by the number of negative reviews, but I guess everyone's body chemistry reacts differently. Will definitely purchase the full-size bottle, as I adore this scent for fall and winter.

reviews.review_title: Chlorine Water with a splash of sweet milk??
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Errmmm....?   ...Smells like a watered-down milk with a slight splash of vanilla and... fresh chlorine maybe?  Almost like sweet pool water.  It is such an odd scent that I keep smelling it, to try and put my finger on it.  It doesn't necessarily smell bad, but not a yummy scent that I MYSELF want to smell like.  It's one of those skin scents that is kinda interesting to smell for myself, but I don't see anyone smelling me and drooling over how good I smell.

reviews.review_title: Try it for yourself, but itu2019s a hard pass for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this fragrance in store. On paper it has a sickly sweet vanilla scent, with an after scent of condescend powder milk. It does smell better the longer you smell it, but not by much. I then tried it on and then it got worse- which is impressive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells very similar to Billie eilishu2019s perfume. The notes sounds nice but the scent isnu2019t very unpleasant, I love vanilla so I was very disappointed. Not a safe blind buy, initially itu2019s very offensive but the dry down is bearable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Ellis Brooklyn. I've smelled my share of vanilla perfumes and for the most part I love them all. This is a very unique scent profile. It is very sweet but very lactonic at the same time. The creaminess is very unique to my nose and this is very long lasting! like 8+ hours! I will mention that my body chemistry usually makes most perfumes sweet so this remained sweet smelling on me with a hint of smokiness so I like it so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: 5 stars for my fellow vanilla lovers!  Saw this perfume on instagram and wanted to get the travel size to see if i liked it, it smells like a sugary warm vanilla mixed with the creaminess of milk. Will.absolutely be getting the full size!

Itu2019s very sweet

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells AMAZING. The name is accurately reflects the scent profile, but there is slightly more nuance making this perfume interesting and perfectly for fall. The vanilla makes it slightly sweet, the milk gives it a creamy skin-like vibe, and theres slightly more nuance making this delcious. Lasting power is average and on par with other perfumes at this price point. I love this and I will buying the full size as soon as I go through this travel size. Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this New parfume! Amazing for fall! Itu2019s so intense and in The same time so light! Love vanilla smell! Itu2019s definatly for someone who love vanilla or looking for nice warm fall parfume! Worst to try! I got this parfume complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like Ellis Brooklyn Bee perfume a lot and I was excited for this perfume because the key note includes Vanilla bean, just like the bee perfume. But sadly, I don't like it as much as bee. It is too sweet and not refreshing enough. It is what I wish my food smell like, but I don't want myself smell like it

This product was gifted by Ellis Brooklyn. It is a super light vanilla scent and lasts all day but does not feel too strong. I typically get headaches from perfumes that are too strong but this one is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is very well named. It is so very lactonic. It smells like a melted vanilla milkshake at first and then it warms up and you can really smell the cocoa pods and sandalwood as it dries down and kind of becomes one with your skin throughout the day. This actually reminds me of Milk+ by Commodity quite a bit, but maybe Vanilla Milk is a bit less sweet on the dry down.   This scent lasts all day on me and projects quite a bit. It seems like some people are getting a lot of smokiness from this, but I donu2019t get that at all. I was actually hoping I would get some of that or that the cocoa pod note would be stronger on me, but itu2019s very lactonic on me. The sandalwood is very strong, and thatu2019s one of my least favorite notes. I would not recommend a blind buy for this. You definitely need to try this before you buy the whole bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn. This Vanilla Milk fragrance smells EXACTLY as if you got vanilla extract on yourself! If you like the smell of vanilla extract, you will probably love this scent. If you, donu2019t, you might want to pass on this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells so good! People ask me all the time what perfume Iu2019m wearing, plus, it lasts all day!This is the only perfume I wear !! It smells wonderful , has no toxins in their perfumes , and the scent last all day for me. Gifted by Ellis brooklyn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so torn on this perfume. I was beyond excited when I first heard of this launching and I was on Sephora as soon as EB the time it would be added. I ordered it right away and I have been wearing it for 3 weeks or so. It does not smell at all like I had expected. I do find it to be quite Smokey and almost like a rum scent. It makes me think of sitting by the camp fire roasting marshmallows, or a boozy date night. It isnu2019t the type of scent Iu2019d cuddle my husband to, but I also canu2019t stop craving the smell. So I donu2019t love it, but I also canu2019t stop wearing it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was an absolute NO! The initial spray smelled like melting plastic. And it takes way to long to get to the dry down. The dry down smelled of sweetened sour milk and vanilla. And once you get to the dry down, the perfume only lasts maybe an hour or two. Just an overall miss.

reviews.review_title: Let it dry down and itu2019s beautiful
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Ellis Brooklyn for my honest review .  I was a little nervous about this one after reading the reviews for it . A lot of people didnu2019t like it but personally Iu2019m shocked at the reviews . I just sprayed it and it smells great ! Thereu2019s lots of sweet vanilla , the only thing Iu2019d say smells a tiny bit weird is ,  it smells sort of like cheerio milk lol . Itu2019s not bad , it turns kind of musky towards the end ,  I havenu2019t smelled vanilla lace in a long time but Iu2019m thinking it smells similar to that . . I donu2019t smell smoke or burnt rubber or plastic or anything , itu2019s not sour , I can only barely detect that u201c cheeriou201d sort of savory note when I think hard . I can definitely see me wearing this , itu2019ll pair great with lots of different scents . Donu2019t listen to reviews on this one , wait until you try it out yourself . I love Ellis Brooklyn, I love all the frosted glass containers. They have such different scents than your average .  Happy to have this in my collection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this.. At first I liked it, I thought yuuum a nice, soft vanilla but about 4 minutes later... I am getting sourrr spoiled milk attempting to be covered by vanilla, it is a stomach turner honestly. Pass

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a little mad. I had high hopes, but perfumetok left me down this time. Reminds me of opening up a baby bottle that has been sitting around for a bit, plus imitation vanilla extract and plastic bags. Returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like spoiled milk!! Do not get it, it is the most foul smell I have ever smelt in my life

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like all of the scents Iu2019ve tried from this brand, so I was really excited to check out their newest scent. Vanilla Milk is exactly that, it smells like warm creamy vanilla. I think itu2019ll be a great fall/winter scent because it does have that warmth to it. Itu2019s definitely sweet, so if you donu2019t like sweet fragrances, this wonu2019t be for you. Itu2019s subtle enough to wear during the day, but could also work for night as well. I think this is another beautiful fragrance from Ellis Brooklyn and I would definitely recommend it! Received complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use gourmand scents exclusively and own Sweet and Bee which I sometimes layer together. I had high hopes for this as I am a fan of vanilla milky scents like Comptoir Sud Pacifique Matin Calin. So  This, however was a disappointment. I got no vanilla milk, just the heavy artificial somewhat sweet and spicy scent. I immediately scrubbed it off, it was offensive

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect Vanilla smell for me! Iu2019ve been on the hunt for one and I finally found it. To me it smells like vanilla and oatmeal. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gross smell, It literally smells like rotten milk. I usually love vanilla scented anything but this is far from any vanilla I've very smelled. Will be returning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent, find it starts lactonic Ave drys down to a powdery vanilla. On my skin I find it more an incense smell rather than a smokiness. I did not find it smells like burning rubber on me at all. I gave 4 stars because it only lasted 4 hours and was quite faint by the 4 hours

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was sad when Killian discontinued Kissing. But this is very similar! The milk scent really makes the perfume special.  I bought the travel size, but I decided I need the big bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product over the last few weeks, I have found the scent to be spot on vanilla cream, very subtle with no smoke at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: On my skin, Vanilla Milk opens up with a delicious creamy vanilla, but then quickly turns into a creamy vanilla with a strong smokey scent reminiscent of a lit firecracker and it is strong all throughout the middle of the fragrance. The dry down is a beautiful faint smokey vanilla, but I couldn't get past the middle stages of the fragrance because it lasts a long time. I would recommend trying it on your skin before you buy, or testing out the travel as it might work with your chemistry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s giving burnt hotdog at a cookout not vanilla milk. Glad I only bought the small size. You may enjoy if you like a smoky scent, but to me it is unpleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Ellis Brooklyn, so Iu2019m excited to try it, but it disappointed me. Its scent is too sweet and overwhelming, more like smoky , bourbon vanilla. Itu2019s not a daily scent. It stays on for a pretty long time . Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was really expecting to like this based on the description of the vanilla notes. Upon first spray the vanilla creaminess came through however upon dry down it smelled like smoky burnt plastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i bought this even when it had super mixed reviews, out of curiosity. saw on TikTok that it was amazing, smells like vanilla bean ice cream, etc. my first impression is that it is VERY smoky. it dries down to a gorgeous vanilla. personally, i smell the smoke all the way through, but comments from friends were positive, feedback was smoky vanilla. iu2019m starting to like this more and more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this so bad since I love anything vanillau2026 but this perfume to me doesnu2019t smell like vanilla at all. Itu2019s actually a very unpleasant scent in my opinion. Definitely not a safe blind buy. Smell it in store before purchasing it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Returning this! Smells like spoiled milk. Definitely will go in stores and smell perfumes moving forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume produced a very weird smell on me based on my body chemistry.  I returned the product to Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the mail and packed it right up again same day. I was excited to get this but it smelled like an expired root beer float with extra expired milk and a sprinkle of dust. it dries down sweeter but still has the dust and I rather not smell dusty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love lactonic and vanilla scents so I was really expecting to enjoy this. But the notes seem really off. There is a vanilla creaminess but it gets overwhelmed by a very odd burnt smell. Not in a good way like MM by the fireplace or a burnt sugar. Itu2019s like burning rubber or plastic. I donu2019t know what could be causing that smell but itu2019s nauseating. Really big letdown with this one. Do not blind buy this. If you like resinous burnt rubber smelling perfumes maybe this is for you, but itu2019s a no from me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Thought this could be my signature scent. The notes sound amazing. Bourbon vanilla, milk, frangipani, how can you go wrong? But this smells like burnt rubber and dries down to vanilla extract.

reviews.review_title: Less Interesting Than Any Other EB Fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love EB, itu2019s always been my go-to for unique fragrances. This is very underwhelming to me as a fan of the nuance in other EB fragrances like West. Itu2019s Vanilla and Milk, thatu2019s it. Try Sci Fi instead.

reviews.review_title: Yes, itu2019s odd and I like it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was concerned seeing the bad reviews and yet I was also intrigued.  Yes, it does smell of burnt rubber when you first spray it and then shortly morphs into this yummy and rich authentic smelling vanilla bean custard confection.  I was so put off by the burnt rubber, then I found it kind of peculiar in a good way and now Iu2019m all in! Lol I really like it, actually. I am a fragrance adventurer so I donu2019t mind weird and quirky smells. I will agree with others that this is most definitely NOT a good blind buy.  Iu2019m pretty sure many people will continue to hate this, but not me. Iu2019m keeping the burnt rubber delight and Iu2019m having fun wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the strong vanilla scent but it only lasts an hour or so unfortunately. At that price point I was expecting more. It also seems like it could be headache inducing - it is STRONG.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ll be returning. This is not a safe blind buy. Itu2019s very milky but not in a warm and cozy way, it smells like spoiled milk mixed with vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was influenced by Tiktok and very disapointed. I smell baby formula + cinnamon in a cheap way. I will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For those reporting this perfume is a u201csubtle vanillau201d, girl idk what kind of vanilla you like but boiiii is this sweet! It reminds me of sweetened condensed milk and marshmallows together. 4 stars as I can see this being headache inducing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so disappointed in this perfume. I really wanted for it to be a vanilla ice cream and waffle cone type of gourmand, but on my skin this smells like firewood, smoke with a tad of vanilla. It was to way too smoky for my liking

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells more like a fireplace with a hint of vanilla. I feel like you could find this scent at bath and body works. Returning it unfortunatelyu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For me the sour milk smell is overpowering. The vanilla comes through right at the beginning and smells nice albeit a basic vanilla, but then it just dries down to literally dry twinges of sour sweet milk. Not for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So many fake reviews in here. This smells like such a cheap artificial vanilla extract, in a bad way. On the dry down a woody/smokiness comes through. The only positive is that itu2019s long lasting. Something about it also leans more masculine. Thereu2019s nothing comforting here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Delicious, woody, creamy - on the skin.  It smells different on clothing, definitely give it a chance on your skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This should be named Smoky Vanilla vs Vanilla Milk. This was straight up smoke with a subtle vanilla note at the end. Not for me. I wish so badly this was just a straight forward lactonic/gourmand

reviews.review_title: this is great if you like sweet or bee
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was a blind buy, but the notes seemed safe for me.  I don't get sour milk notes at all, it's a creamy, spicy, slightly woody vanilla on me.I like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i bought this online without smelling it first because i typically really like this brand and loved the sound of this perfume. i read reviews complaining about the scent so i was worried but i LOVE it. typically not a vanilla perfume type gal but this one is perfect for transitioning into fall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try this because I love vanilla perfumes. It smelled like sour milk. I used soap and water to get it off my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After reading the reviews here a bd other places- I was prepared for a let down ( Iu2019d already ordered it) When it arrived I did what I always do- one spray on a shirt, one on my neck. Wow what a difference! When it mixed with my body chemistry it smelled warm, and slightly sweet- but not overly so. There was a milkiness to it but it was inviting not strange. Now the spray on my shirt was pure u2018Play-dohu2019 Iu2019m so happy I do that - I donu2019t know if I could have judged otherwise Well WOW

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On me this smelled more like vanilla extract but like an aerosol form of the alcohol base and not the vanilla itself. It doesn't have that warm cozy vanilla feel to it, also doesn't have any sweetness if you're looking for that and I didn't pick up anything lactonic or milky/creamy, that vanilla extract alcohol scent was just so overpowering for me. it lasted about 2 hours on my skin. I'm glad I got a sample and didn't blind buy because it was not what I was expecting.
This smells rancid. I thought it would be like a warm, creamy vanilla. NO. Smells like sour milk. Absolutely disgusting, will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume gifted by Ellis brooklyn  I don't necessarily  like it alone because it has a milky scent but when layerd with warm gourmand notes fragnance it smells so amazing and delicious. I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: Its a no for me dawg!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so confused! All the notes in this sound amazing but when its sprayed it goes left. It smells like milk that has gone off. I'm glad I only bought the travel size. Returning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you are expecting a yummy creamy vanilla - this is not it. Itu2019s a bit pungent when you first spray it. I kept hoping the dry down would be more pleasant but it gave me a headache. If you love gourmands this is not the one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The opening on my skin is so off!(It is like a chemical, sharp smokey almost rubber type scent. Nothing like By the Fireplace. Then it turns to a soft nice warm vanilla but with the initial note lightly in the background. On the complete drydown, it is a NICE scent. I unfortunately cannot get passed the initial and middle part of the fragrance. Not a safe blind buy in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible!!!!! DO NOT BUY!!!! Honestly the worst perfume I have ever smelled in my life. Has a spoiled smell to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Uhh how did this product make it out of development without someone at the company saying, u201cHey guys, this is not goodu201d?? Iu2019m a huge fraghead and I love all types of vanillau2026 Atelier Vanille Intensee, TF Tobacco Vanille, Kayali Vanilla 28, Floral Street Wild Orchid and Vanillau2026. I was SO excited for this drop cause I love so many of Ellis Brooklynu2019s line and a yummy lactonic vanilla is just what I want for fall!   This is not that.  This fragrance contains a yummy vanilla u2026 under a very harsh chemically, burned rubber, ammonia scent. This second smell is not subtle. Itu2019s the main note. Itu2019s what I imagine the bile acid in your throat after you vomit ice cream might smell like.  It nearly feels like someone sabotaged the launch by pouring some nasty cleaning solution into an otherwise nice scent.

reviews.review_title: Will but the full bottle soon!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume actually smells like what it says it has in itu2026unique vanilla fragrance it actually smells like a dessert! But it does have a Smokey scent in the background but itu2019s not overpowering I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are wanting a gourmand this is not it. This isn't bad, it's just not what I was expecting based on the description. This is a sort of a smokey vanilla with a hint of cold milk... that's the best I can do as far as describing it myself. I'll use the travel size, but I'm not gonna get the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a safe blindbuy (even if you like vanilla scents or By the Fireplace)... really just go in to smell this and save your money. Weak performance, lasts two hours. Started off like sour milk or burnt tires, then just turned burnt smell with a weird vanilla scent in the background. If it smells different on you then I am truly jealous because I really wanted to like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Delightful warm vanilla fragrance in a frosted glass bottle with golden accents. Has a little bit of a musky floral undertone. I'd say this is like a sweet but formal scent. Long-lasting and spritzes smooth. [gifted by Ellis Brooklyn].

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sadly, this smells like a sat by a campfire. On me, itu2019s a STRONG smoky, fire smell. Super disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to purchase Vanilla Milk. Iu2019m into gourmand fragrances. For example, I like Daisy Love, Princess, & most perfumes but this was a hard no. With the name Vanilla Milk I was expecting a nice creamy vanilla. It smells like vanilla perfume but thereu2019s something off. I didnu2019t spray it on my body, I sprayed it only on my clothes to make the scent last longer. I like to leave a scent trail so Iu2019m pretty heavy handed with spraying perfume. I couldnu2019t smell anything after 1 hour. I really had to dig my nose in the shirt to smell it. When my bf smelled it he said it smelled like vanilla mixed with sour milk without knowing the name of the perfume. To me it smells like vanilla mixed with dirty clothes with a hint of smoke. I tried to layer it but nothing helped. It smells like Replica Jazz Club mixed with Prada Candy & Fireplace.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite fragrance! This is a must have if youu2019re a vanilla lover like me. Itu2019s creamy and light, and I love the little hint of cocoa, and the slightly flowery peony. They all compliment each other really well, and make this stick out from my other vanilla scents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I usually donu2019t write reviews but the bag is soooo mixed in this one I felt like I had to because I *love* it. It smells DELICIOUS and it makes me want a milkshake. It smells exactly like if you put a little vanilla extract and sugar into milk. When it dries down a little of the creamy scent fades and it gets a bit muskier but it still smells nice; sweet and yummy. Itu2019s a super unique vanilla scent and perfect for fall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am SO disappointed to say this because I love vanilla perfume, but there is something about this fragrance that just smells bad. Itu2019s like a sour, milky, musty, smoky scent and I wanted to shower this perfume off immediately after applying it. If you like sweeter vanilla scents, stay away from this one. Super Amber is the only Ellis Brooklyn scent I like - a lot of their perfume line seems to have a sort of u201cfunku201d to them with the way some of the notes mix together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s not a bad perfume. Initially, it smells like vanilla bean ice cream but that lasts only a minute until the scent develops more. Unfortunately, once the scent settles on my skin completely, it smells like burnt vanilla. I donu2019t get a Smokey scent, it just smells burnt to me. First spray is pretty, but the dry down is not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like drinking a vanilla bean frappe in the woods. I personally am a vanilla scent fanatic so I knew I would love this. I just wish the sillage was a bit more prominent. Great for layering as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was nervous about receiving this as I saw a lot of negative reviews after I ordered. Donu2019t always trust influencers and people that get free product because this is really nice. Itu2019s not a basic super sweet vanilla but itu2019s a warm fall winter vanilla that is both creamy and a bit spicy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hereu2019s what this perfume is: classic doll head scent in a bottle! Itu2019s so nostalgic smellingu2026plastic vanilla slightly makeup smelling scent. I love the way it smellsu2026but i can see what others are finding the initial top notes a bit off. The dry down is powdery woody vanilla, less plastic smelling. Lasts pretty longu2026about 6 hours on me. The scent is very addictingu2026love it! My current favourite from the brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very peculiar fragrance because of my initial whiff of a pungent chemical-like milky aroma, very unpleasant. The dry down is just an ok vanilla note which doesnu2019t makeup for that horrid milky introduction, lol. I love most of Ellis Brooklyn fragrances and unfortunately this one was a disappointment. This is not a safe blind buy! Youu2019ve been warned!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This vanilla scent was not really the type of vanilla you would expect. It was not sweet or traditional. I didnu2019t like the Smokey scent that was in this, it didnu2019t go with the scent and wasnu2019t my type of scent. Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This vanilla milk perfume was gifted by Ellis Brooklyn and honestly does not have enough of a vanilla scent to it. Do not get me wrong, I think the scent is nice and warm for fall, however it doesnu2019t have that vanilla scent I crave from my fall perfumes. If youu2019re searching for a true vanilla perfume, I would skip this one, however if youu2019re looking for a unique, warm fall fragrance, this one is worth a shot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just received my travel bottle of this today, and this fragrance screams FALL: if you were hoping for a soft, dreamy little wisp of a thing, yes, youu2019ll be sad, because u201cVanilla Milku201d is first cousins to Maison Margielau2019s u201cBy The Fireplace,u201d but with a touch more vanilla, a soft creamy lactonic base, and a little less smoke. The vanilla is high quality, none of that artificial vanilla-candy stuff, itu2019s bourbon vanilla, and the lactonic note only comes out to play after the smoky woods fade. But I think it is a PERFECT fall scent for vanilla and lactonic lovers, and an easy blindu2014buy if you already love u201cBy The Fireplace.u201d Do you need both? That depends on how hard-core into the nuance of perfumes you happen do be. I am quite happy to own small bottles of both, and I will wear u201cVanilla Milku201d when I want a classic yet modern take on the vanilla genre, whereas I will wear my MM BTFP when Iu2019m going for a smokier, darker vibe. This is quite well done, very happy with my purchase!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this one so badly. I am a sucker for vanilla scents but this was a complete miss. At first, the scent is strong and unpleasant but it mellows out and then itu2019s just okay. Just get Kay Ali 28!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love Myth and Super Amber but I hate thisu2026 the smoky note is not for me, I thought it would be more vanilla/musk but itu2019s way too sweet and smoky. I am going to return my purchase unfortunatelyu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Dear Fragcomm, do not do this unless you have a strong desire to to smell like bacon. Even if that scent profile rocks your boat, you'll only have it for a total of 5 minutes tops. Don't be fooled by the notes....just don't smh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: really wanted to love this. super disappointed. i adored the name and concept and aesthetic. but it doesnu2019t smell anything like vanilla or milk. smells like straight up alcohol. sadly returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

It reminds of crispy marshmallows made over a fire while still being elevated and compelling. Itu2019s truly beautiful and definitely my new favorite from this brand. 10/10 recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: Received my blind purchase of this today and couldnu2019t wait to try it on. If you like the smell of stale graham crackers soaked in sour milk, then this is for you. Awful. Just awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Based on the initial reviews and notes of this perfume I thought Iu2019d be getting a sweeter, creamy vanilla gourmand scent - however, the dry down on my skin smells strongly of alcohol and smoke with a hint of warmth from the vanilla. This is definitely not a sweet vanilla, and almost turns pungent on my skin. Definitely not what I expected, so I would recommend testing this before buying as I donu2019t think this will be for everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, this perfume suffers because of the expectations vanilla milk evokes. Why is this so smoky? This was not a lactonic, dreamy scent, but smells like spilling vanilla extract while baking - a little sharp, a little smoky. It's not bad, it's fine, but less novel than I'd hoped. Does mellow a little as it settles. Will hang on to this as I'm almost out of Fresh Cream - Warm Cashmere and that's a similar vibe (not a dupe, but caters to the same mood).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: OK so for starters this is an actual review, this review is not incentivized and I did not gain anything from writing this review. These are my honest opinions on this fragrance. I really wanted to love this, because Iu2019m typically a fan of anything vanilla and vanilla milk sounded appealing. letu2019s just say Iu2019m glad I bought the smaller size instead of the full size bottle. I donu2019t really smell the vanilla note as much as I would like, as a matter of fact it smells like straight up smoke, think like youu2019re sitting around a campfire, but like directly in front of that campfire and the smoke is going up your nose. Thatu2019s the vibe I get from this perfume. I was picturing more of a creamy, milky, cozy vibe. This again is giving me more of a smoky, bourbon type vanilla which is also good. But the smoky note out did every other note in this fragrance in my opinion. The longevity is all right, and I will say it is on the stronger side. The dry down is better than the initial spray, the smokiness starts to dissipate after a few minutes. But if youu2019re again looking for a creamy milky vanilla vibe, this isnu2019t for you.

reviews.review_title: Smells nothing like the description or namesake
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried using this perfume a few times since receiving it and I just can't come around to it. The description online is what got me to blind buy it, and I am so disappointed because I really wanted to love it. When you first spray it, it smells similar to what I had expected based on the description, but once it settles on the skin it smells extremely smoky. It's as if you were sitting in front of a campfire for hours, with none of the promised creamy vanilla to offset it. I found after about an hour of wear, the smokiness wears off and a more pleasant vanilla scent is left. If the scent after the dry-down is what was there the whole time I would keep this perfume and probably wear it daily, however the smoky smell in-between is too much to handle. Hours after application my bathroom still smells like an outdoor campfire. Even my husband (who never notices new perfumes) commented about how horrible it smelled when I first tried it on. Try this in person before buying if possible!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hard pass on this one. The opening is strong, woody and musky. Made me slightly nauseas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I only wish the Ellis Brooklyn scents lasted longer on my skin. Overall, I'm very impressed with this new launch! Ellis Brooklyn gifted me this perfume, all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn This is a great perfume if you like sweet smelling perfumes it smells exactly like vanilla bean ice cream But it also has a little bit of a spicy smell like cinnamon or nutmeg

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
