reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been fairly hit or miss with Ellis Brooklyn's fragrances in the past so I was not sure how to expect with the Vanilla Milk scent. On a positive note, the travel size was both beautifully packaged with a smooth spraying mechanism. The scent itself is overall disappointing though. While there were creamy top-notes one would expect from both the vanilla and the milk, there was additionally a harsh undertone that smelled abrasive and almost burnt. I was hoping this would be a new fall scent for me, but it's a miss instead. My partner really enjoyed this fragrance though so of course these things are subjective.  *Received complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn in exchange for my honest opinion.*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn. I am a HUGE EB fan and own almost all of their scents. Vanilla Milk is delicious and sweet without being too sweet, warm without needing cold outside to justify it, and still milky and creamy. Not necessarily the most unique vanilla ever, but definitely a new favorite of mine (wearing it while typing this!)

I absolutely love this scent. I received the smaller travel size. Itu2019s a light and summery vanilla scent, not too overpowering or sweet. This lasts long and is feminine. Love it, itu2019s going to be my daily scent. Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn Vanilla Milk. First I love the sweet smell. This Ellis brooklyn's Vanilla Milk smells good. It is sweet with the hit of milk and vanilla in it. It is perfect because i love the sweet smell and this lasts for a long time. This is just what I needed for my daily use. For me it is not very overwhelming it is just the kind of sweetness I needed.

reviews.review_title: Overwhelming Opening with a Pleasant Dry Down
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After trying a few fragrances from Ellis Brooklyn, it seems that I always have the same problem with the brand that keeps me from fully enjoying the scents. It seems I tend to dislike the opening notes, but do like how the scents dry down after a few hours. On my skin, Vanilla Milk opens with a smoky, heavy, creamy scent that I personally do not like and find to be overwhelming. After a few hours the fragrance dries down to a sweet, lightly sugared, whipped, creamy vanilla that I really enjoy. However, I dislike the top notes so much that waiting for the dry down is not worth it for me. I received this complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn in exchange for honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn.  This smells like a very creamy, spicy vanilla, and I can almost detect some sort of smokiness to it. I donu2019t know why this is releasing during the summer because it is definitely more of a fall/winter scent. The scent is pretty heavy and long-lasting, so I personally would not recommend using it during hotter days as it can be overwhelming. A couple spritzes and I can still smell it on me several hours later. Pretty long-lasting, but the timing of the release is a bit weird.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A decadent gourmand fragrance. It's an interesting take on a vanilla dominant fragrance, which are typically overly sweet and juvenile. This fragrance is a warm, chocolatey vanilla bean with spiced milk, and a touch of musk. Without the complexity of spice and musk, I think this would be a cloyingly sweet fragrance. The notes are balanced nicely. The projection and silage is decent. I like to wear this to sleep and can still smell it on my shirt in the morning. Gifted by Ellis Brooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

You get that hint of vanilla thatu2019s natural smelling. Would recommend this product to anyone who is into vanilla scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Ellis Brooklyn. The smell is really persistent, it is better not to mix it with others, it may turn out to be an explosive mixture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Ellis Brooklyn. Iu2019m absolutely obsessed with this brand!!! And obsessed with this newest addition to the EB family! Itu2019s the perfect vanilla blend and perfect for the transition from summer to fall

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *gifted by Ellis Brooklyn for my honest review:)  This gourmand fragrance screams FALL to me!! It gives warm, cozy, relaxing vibes for sureu2026I picture myself wearing this perfume when I hangout with my friends to catch up on life, relax at home with my significant other and spend some quality time, or wonder around town on a breezy fall day!! The fragrance mainly focuses on the scents of vanilla and creamy milk (itu2019s absolutely delicious) and I also smell hints of cocoa and musk!! Iu2019m obsessed!!! Donu2019t forget, this fragrance is paraben-free, phthalates-free, cruelty-free, vegan, and comes in a sustainable packaging!! Need I say more?! A MUST BUY!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: It is going to be my favorite scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume as a complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn. The fragrance is amazing: not tart, with light notes of sweetness; deep and gentle at the same time. The perfume is keeping you in the warm hands of the summer. Long-lasting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fragrance for vanilla lovers. It is so interesting and unusual, I want to inhale it all day long. The first few minutes it is slightly bitter, then warm-sweet with notes of freshness, and at the end of the day it smells of musk and vanilla. It is difficult to describe all the notes that I hear. The fragrance is very complex and develops throughout the day, and is also very persistent on the skin and clothes. I believe that everyone should try this fragrance, do not judge it by the first minutes, let it stay all day on your body so that you feel all the subtleties of this crazy vanilla. I love it! I received Vanilla Milk eau de parfum complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Ellis Brooklyn in exchange for my honest review. Iu2019m not usually a fan of vanilla scented products but this one pleasantly surprised me. It wasnu2019t too overpowering and stayed on my skin for a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

Just think of it as a sweet but delicious vanilla scone ready for the warm invitation of fall to come.
